_sText:
--->Ok, just to clarify: I didn't use any VMEX or other tools to descompile a CS:S version to make my own.

I opened CS1.6 original version and rebuilt every single block. Then I added detail and some other stuff. Hope I've cleared that confusion.<---

------------------------------------------------------
Summary - Fy Pool Day Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------
Title : Pool Day Reloaded Lite
Level Name : Fy Pool Day Reloaded Lite
Filename : fy_pool_day_reloaded_lite
Version : 2.1
Release Date : 08/26/2007
Author : Xblah
Email Address : changremista@gmail.com
Web Site : http://xblahleveldesigns.tripod.com

------------------------------------------------------
Comments - Fy Pool Day Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

Why choosing this map?
--Because its level of detail is high
--Because bots are improved
--Because its FPS were increased

Reloaded V1 Lite:

Fixed non-textured Areas
Removed Normal Maps
Fixed Nav File now is External

Reloaded V1:

Added Smooth Corners
Fixed Weapons WITH Ammo
Added Pool Grenades

------------------------------------------------------
Servers Running - Surf Grave Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

***Ask for adding your server***

------------------------------------------------------
Installing - Fy Pool Day Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

To install the map, open the .zip file and extract all
the files to the directory: ...\cstrike\maps\

------------------------------------------------------
In Game Configuration - Fy Pool Day Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------

No custom configuration is needed.

------------------------------------------------------
Details - Fy Pool Day Reloaded Lite
------------------------------------------------------
Game : Counter-Strike: Source
Type : Fight Yard
Recommended Players : 2-20
Mods : CS:S
Description : ---
Known Bugs : None
Construction Time : 2 Day
Editor Used : Hammer WE 4.0
Base Textures : Pool Night (no Normals)
